phrases: Who is in a relationship with who?
When did you step into that territory?
Moguzo and Ranta, I am counting on you to each get one.
And it is Miss Merry to you.
So was he basically telling me to take his place, and be the leader for our party?
Buy yourself a helmet, even if it is just a cheap one.
I am pretty sure Merry was about to say, see you tomorrow.
If it is about Merry, Hayashi would be a better person to ask.
It had the spots of death, so people called this kobold Death Spots.
And I thought, this has never happened before, so why is it happening now?
I, uh... just thought you two were... in a relationship.
Well, you did not have to come so early just to apologize.
What is this about being in a relationship?
Who with whom in what kind of relationship?!
That is what Shihoru's trying to say.
What kind of situation would make her jump to conclusions?
Well, you see, it is because...
I have a bad feeling about this...
Haru-kun was just hugging me really tightly, and Shihoru saw us.
Haruhiro, when did you step into that territory?!
What is that supposed to mean?
No way that is the case!
You were definitely trying to do something there!
And do not cut out the details!
They are very important, you understand?!
Repeating a yesterday filled with scrapes,
We clear the path to a hopeful tomorrow.
The voice I raised upwards scattered into the air.
The reality I have gamed is hazy,
and even if I cannot see ahead of me,
I can keep moving forward on this long road
Connecting a bond covered in dust,
We join back to back in the past and future.
Repeating an answer full of mistakes,
I will reach out my hands to seek the light, again and again.
You are a boring guy, Haruhiro.
So you see, me and Shihoru are going to try to be nicer to Merry-chan.
I-It would be nice if she would just heal us...
She has no intention of doing that.
I know we cannot immediately treat her as part of our group,
but if we always think of her as an outsider, she will never have a chance to become part of our group.
Well, Merry-chan has not been friendly with us, but me and Shihoru have not exactly been friendly to her either.
Sh-She actually might be a good person.
We added her to our party, so does not that make her a friend?
Well, having her is better than having no Priest.
Wait, does that mean... maybe she will fawn over me?
Did you just make a comeback at me?
She gives me that look when I am just greeting her.
So Merry-chan, what did you eat for breakfast?
H-How long have you been a Volunteer Soldier?
Are there any snacks you like to eat?
I am counting on you to each get one.
Yume and I will get the third.
Shihoru and Merry will back us up from the rear.
Do not pull back from such a weak attack!
Damn, she is so stuck up.
I can tell I hit a critical spot by the resistance I feel.
Our teamwork was not great, but what a huge victory.
I defeated it in one fell swoop, so it was all thanks to me!
O light, return to Lumiaris' divine protection.
So you will heal us, as long as it is after the fighting.
That is enough for Moguzo, is not it?
It is starting to clot up, though...
Why do not you spit on it?
Also, do not be so familiar with me.
You are this close from me losing my temper at you.
Merry, you have a set way in how you work as a healer.
Well, I was just thinking that there are different types of Priests.
I am a Thief, so I do not know much about Priests.
I think it is perfectly fine if you do not know.
We will not pry into your personal life or anything...
If you do not like how I work, just say so.
This place is so full of people.
Well, Merry-chan does not react the same way as most people do.
But that did hurt a little just now.
B-But, we did not say anything either.
Maybe she was thinking, they probably will not say'hi,' and was preparing herself mentally for that.
Why do we have to be so considerate of her?
This is exactly why girls hate you, Ranta.
It is nothing a flat-chested girl has the right to say!
Yume definitely does not seem that small...
What are you making me say?!
Is not that Shinohara-san from Orion?
And is not Shinohara the master of Orion?
Manato... said he is entrust me.
In other words... become a party leader?
But truthfully, I do not want to do it.
I do not want to bear that burden.
Moguzo is more cautious than usual, because he has no helmet.
If he had a helmet, he would not die from a blow to the head.
I am a Thief, so I usually attack from behind, but that is not an option for Moguzo.
Our roles are different, so I never understood Moguzo's fighting style.
I never tried to observe his fighting style in the first place.
I never thought Merry to be the type to pray over the dead.
But, I do not actually know anything about Merry.
I will chip in, so buy yourself a helmet, even if it is just a cheap one.
You do not have to chip in.
It is everyone is loss if you do not have proper equipment.
Once you get proper armor, you would be able to fight all out, right?
So, it is for my own good, too.
Now that you mention it, that is a good point.
Let us all look for a cute helmet together.
Do not just stand there, dammit.
I am not just standing here!
Merry said her staff is just for show, but that is not true.
She is learned skills for her staff.
She just does not want to fight on the front lines, but she still protected Shihoru.
She is scary every single time.
Are not we friends in the same party?
Is not it better to be liked than hated?
I would like to say that to her, but I cannot.
If I say anything personal, she will probably leave.
Why are you being so formal?
Man, she is a real nasty one.
She was a little different today.
I thought Merry-chan was kind of cute today, though.
I am pretty sure Merry was about to say that.
That is what I decided to think today.
Hey, I want to go ask Shinohara-san from Orion something.
Will you all come with me?
You were talking to her yesterday, right?
Will you tell us about Merry?
I do not think she would tell us anything if we asked her.
Then... rather than me, Hayashi would be a better person to ask.
Hayashi used to be in Merry's party.
Merry and I were friends from when we were Trainee Volunteer Soldiers, just like you all are now.
Mutsumi was our Mage, Ogu was our Thief, and Merry was our Priest.
Our party was one that had a smooth start.
We bought our badges after about ten days,
and we were not exposed to real danger until we began our hunt for a kobold in the Cyrene Mine.
At the time, we took how easy it was for granted.
That is why we did not realize how much of a burden we were putting on Merry.
She was always bright, cheerful, and smiling.
So much that our party was never gloomy.
She would heal us right away, even if it was just a scratch.
And if Mutsumi or Ogu were in trouble, she would help them right away, so of course we had it easy.
Merry was doing enough for three people.
The more battles we fought, the more our confidence grew.
We were not afraid of anything back then.
But the difference between victory and defeat is paper-thin.
But Merry always prevented the thing that could make us fall into utter defeat.
Other parties had also been trying to seize Cyrene Mine, and we did not want to lose to them.
And in the fifth layer down, we met it.
A giant, black and white-spotted kobold.
A great number of Volunteer Soldiers had died by its hand.
People called this kobold Death Spots.
I regret that more than anything.
The kobold hit me, and I fell unconscious.
When I came to, Ogu and Mutsumi were dead...
Over and over, I shouted to Merry to go and heal Michiki.
I have used up all my magic...
That day, we lost three of our members.
And that is when she stopped smiling.
I have let three of my precious comrades... friends... die.
I have no right to be a healer...
the dry air after a rain,
The warmth you gave this hand
led me to a future I can treasure
I wonder when you became so strong.
I will probably find what I searched the vast world for
at the end of this journey.
Now serialized on the official anime web site.
